title: An answer to the excellent and elegant speech made by Sir Thomas Player, the worthy chamberlain of London, to the Right Honble [sic] the Lord mayor, etc. on Friday the 12th of September, 1679 / by H. B. ...
author: H. B., Citizen of London.
notes: Another issue has title : A reply to the excellent and elegant speech made by Sir Thomas Player.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
